flawed_nl_solution:
Mary gives away 26/2 = <<26/2=13>>13 blue shirts.
Mary gives away 36/3 = <<36/3=12>>12 brown shirts.
Mary has 26-13 = <<26-13=13>>13 blue shirts left.
Mary has 36-12 = <<36-12=29>>29 brown shirts left.
Mary has 13+29 = <<13+29=42>>42 shirts left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24.0, not 29.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
